channel.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
channel.description:
Ask here for tips and tricks about this chapter. Tell where you're stuck and others will give the solutions.
[i](Please keep always on topic. Don't post about other chapters or create random chit-chat here)[/i]

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I am not entirely sure where the problem happened, but perhaps you can double check your instalation process by reviewing it here:
https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Installation_Manual#Installation_Instructions_.28step_by_step.29

Meanwhile, did you install to your C drive or to a different drive? If I remember correctly, installing to a different drive can cause problems.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Olocaus
item.description:
can someone help me here? This is totally the wrong place to reply but I cant figure out this forum… I just downloaded blackmesa but cant find the launcher for it now. It worked once but It isnt showing up in my steam library. Can anyone tell me the default name of the launcher so I can search for it and find it?

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Well, there’s always more than one way to skin an ichthyosaur.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: adrianfox
item.description:
On my first playthrough I got stuck here. I had no idea what to do. I loaded a previous save and let the tram smash through, jumping off before it did. I then jumped to the other side. I didn’t know you had to use the red barrels.

I didn’t fight the big fish. I jumped to a barnacle near the door and while shooting the barnacle I pressed the forward key. I then landed on the broken walkway by the door.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
You can try crouch jumping it. Or if memory serves me right (it may not, so save before you try this) there should be a door under water which you can open if you’d like, but you’ll have to take a chance with the Icthy’s if you do. It’s right below the platform you’re standing on, in the wall to the left of the screen. The door requires you to hold E on it to open though, so if you leave the Icthy’s alive it’s risky.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: 007vsMagua
item.description:
I seem to be a late-comer to this specific thread. My problem develops latter on when I need to jump through a gate with 3 live wires dangling. (see save below). I’ve looked at two great walkthroughs of chapter ‘Apprehension’ on YouTube and both show running and jumping to get past the wires, some damage is taken, but the player falls into the water and continues.

When I try to jump, I get electrocuted, knocked back, and killed. Somewhere I needed to kill the power, but where? Or do I need to do a special jump?

1024×576 61.9 KB

ps_ after rifling through a number of YouTube video walkthroughts of chapter ‘Apprehension’, I finally found one that shows the true opening to jump through. I’m not sure why others can jump past the wires? Anyway I’m past now…thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Buco
item.description:
After putting the barrels under the broken bridge, I only managed to do the jump from the fence. First jump on the fence, move carefully and sprint jump to the other side. Rather annoying part indeed…

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Bjossi
item.description:
You could have just temporarily enabled always run. I can imagine sprint-crouch-jumping being a bit tricky to time right.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: ElSplund
item.description:
raised the ramp with no problem but I simply cannot sprint-jump, crouch-jump, or sprint-crouch-jump my way across. Struggling to get the dev console to work so I can tweak the gravity!
Finally! after hunting around for 4 pallets I managed to make a bridge and walk across - TFFT

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Yeah in general, if you don’t know what to do, there are usually subtle indicators that are meant to catch your attention, such as flickering lights, sparks, bubbles, subtle differences in color or contrast, and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
dragunov2:

I past the vehicle and get in some kind of room with garages at both sides, a stairwell and a room, all underwater…

What to do next?

Got stuck here…

Thanks!

There is a large hole with bubbles rising from it.

Go through.

Read full topic

Swim past that vehicle. The entrance isn’t totally blocked by it.

I past the vehicle and get in some kind of room with garages at both sides, a stairwell and a room, all underwater…

What to do next?

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Stuck in the Assassin Garage. Wasted the Assassins (faster than I usually would in Half-Life) got the achievement for Icing one with a shot from the .357, Flipped the “Surface Access” switch. Entered the inconspicuous room behind the blast doors. Nada.

UPDATE
I was in the wrong side of the structure.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Yeah, it’s pretty clear. If it’s not moving then you probably missed a barrel.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Once you make the platform obviously move (it will splash around and stuff), all you need is a crouch-jump.

It doesn’t even take that many barrels.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Clueless
item.description:
Insomnautik:

Had the same problem, was just about to noclip when i realized the bridge was ALREADY UP. The barrels raise it but not very high… I didn’t even notice that they made a difference at first, until I made a successful crouch-jump to the other side.

i thought that happened in my case too
but i stayed under water and watched the bridge after i stuffed each and every barrel
all four barrels …one by one
bridge never moved an inch
some one has a “you tube” video posted with a walkthru of this level
when you see him add the last barrel you can see the bridge move up noticeably…even makes a splashing sound

i hate to cheat but it was either NOCLIP my way across or die of old age
playing “Carry the Barrel”

Ever Onward Regards

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Insomnautik
item.description:
Clueless:

Interestingly i found 4 red floats/barrels …placed them under the submerged bridge and the bridge never rose up
at one point i had something like 8-9 floats all stuffed under the bridge
i even tried repositioning the floats…put some in the front of the bridge…some towards the back
Bridge never budged an inch
it must be a bug/glitch
i had to NO CLIP my way to the ramp

Bridge To Nowhere Regards

Had the same problem, was just about to noclip when i realized the bridge was ALREADY UP. The barrels raise it but not very high… I didn’t even notice that they made a difference at first, until I made a successful crouch-jump to the other side.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Clueless
item.description:
Ergates:

Thanks. I’d already worked out how to make it rise by putting the barrels underneath, that was obvious. It was the crouch jumping thing that got me, and I’d convinced myself that I was overlooking something. Did it eventually.

I’m absolutely dreading Residual Processing - always my most hated level as I hate first person jumping puzzles. An entire level full of tricky jumps, which will probably involve a load of crouch jumping in Black Mesa… Joy joy joy

Conti:

Try to find more red floats like the ones that are already below that submerged bridge. They are in the surroundings. Put all them below the bridge and it will emerge.

After that you need to duck-jump to the other side.

Interestingly i found 4 red floats/barrels …placed them under the submerged bridge and the bridge never rose up
at one point i had something like 8-9 floats all stuffed under the bridge
i even tried repositioning the floats…put some in the front of the bridge…some towards the back
Bridge never budged an inch
it must be a bug/glitch
i had to NO CLIP my way to the ramp

Bridge To Nowhere Regards

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.description:
Milothestuckone:

I’m at a part where I’ve finished riding a big yellow tram, and there’s alot of water, and I’m not sure how to get out.

I’m stuck in this same area, except that I’m on the other side of the large wall on the left side of this screenshot where there’s a tunnel underwater that’s blocked by a military vehicle. What am I overlooking?

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: lucifer579
item.description:
Mathesar:

Man this part took me so long to get through… I was low on health so taking the live wire route wouldn’t work (instant death), I must of attempted jumping through the right side hole 30 times before finally making it lol.

The fuck, I made it on the first try.
I stood to the Right of the hole in the fence (on a very small pathwalk). And made a simple jump and made it through.

Read full topic

item.title: APPREHENSION - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Mathesar
item.description:
Conti:

Actually you need to jump through the role in the fence at the right side of the eletric wire.
Stay on the edge of the slippy walkway and try to crouch-jump. It is a bit tricky.

Man this part took me so long to get through… I was low on health so taking the live wire route wouldn’t work (instant death), I must of attempted jumping through the right side hole 30 times before finally making it lol.

Read full topic
